text: Curious about Michelle Wu’s husband and kids? The Democratic politician and the Mayor of Boston assumed the mayoral office in the city in 2021. Wu is currently in the news after the birth of her new baby and refiling a property tax bill. This has also prompted people to wonder about her personal life, especially her family. So, here’s everything to know about Wu’s spouse, the couple’s relationship, as well as their kids. Who is Michelle Wu married to? Michelle Wu’s husband is Conor Pewarski. Originally from Massachusetts, Pewarski attended Yale University and met Wu through mutual friends at a Harvard–Yale football game party hosted by the latter. The couple initially had a long-distance relationship. Eventually, Pewarski relocated to Chicago to help Wu with her family crisis. When she returned to Massachusetts to attend Harvard Law School, he also accompanied her. (via The Boston Globe) Michele Wu and Conor Pewarski got engaged in the Cambridge Common Park in Cambridge, Massachusetts, and tied the knot on September 8, 2012. What is Conor Pewarski’s job? While Conor Pewarski is a banker, he has been a stay-at-home parent since Michele Wu became the mayor. Furthermore, he holds the ceremonial title of the first gentleman of Boston. Per The Boston Globe, when Pewarski was in his early 20s, he pursued a career as a film producer in Hollywood. But, as mentioned above, he relocated to Chicago to help his wife with her family. According to his LinkedIn page, Conor Pewarski previously worked for Wells Fargo from June 2010 to April 2013. He then joined East Boston Savings Bank and was employed there until November 2021. How many kids do Michelle Wu and Conor Pewarski have? Michelle Wu and her husband Conor Pewarski have three children together. The couple’s eldest, a son they named Blaise, was born in 2014. They welcomed their second son, Cass, in 2017. In January 2025, Wu gave birth to her and Pewarski’s third child, a daughter they named Mira. “Mom and baby are in good health, and the Mayor is in touch with her senior staff,” a statement released by Wu’s office read. “Mayor Wu wishes to express her deepest gratitude to the nurses, doctors, and healthcare staff who made this possible for her family and who work every day to support so many families across the city.” (via CBS News)

Curious about Michelle Wu’s husband and kids? The Democratic politician and the Mayor of Boston assumed the mayoral office in the city in 2021. Wu is currently in the news after the birth of her new baby and refiling a property tax bill. This has also prompted people to wonder about her personal life, especially her family.

So, here’s everything to know about Wu’s spouse, the couple’s relationship, as well as their kids.

Who is Michelle Wu married to?

Michelle Wu’s husband is Conor Pewarski.

Originally from Massachusetts, Pewarski attended Yale University and met Wu through mutual friends at a Harvard–Yale football game party hosted by the latter. The couple initially had a long-distance relationship. Eventually, Pewarski relocated to Chicago to help Wu with her family crisis. When she returned to Massachusetts to attend Harvard Law School, he also accompanied her. (via The Boston Globe)

Michele Wu and Conor Pewarski got engaged in the Cambridge Common Park in Cambridge, Massachusetts, and tied the knot on September 8, 2012.

What is Conor Pewarski’s job?

While Conor Pewarski is a banker, he has been a stay-at-home parent since Michele Wu became the mayor. Furthermore, he holds the ceremonial title of the first gentleman of Boston.

Per The Boston Globe, when Pewarski was in his early 20s, he pursued a career as a film producer in Hollywood. But, as mentioned above, he relocated to Chicago to help his wife with her family.

According to his LinkedIn page, Conor Pewarski previously worked for Wells Fargo from June 2010 to April 2013. He then joined East Boston Savings Bank and was employed there until November 2021.

How many kids do Michelle Wu and Conor Pewarski have?

Michelle Wu and her husband Conor Pewarski have three children together.

The couple’s eldest, a son they named Blaise, was born in 2014. They welcomed their second son, Cass, in 2017. In January 2025, Wu gave birth to her and Pewarski’s third child, a daughter they named Mira.

“Mom and baby are in good health, and the Mayor is in touch with her senior staff,” a statement released by Wu’s office read. “Mayor Wu wishes to express her deepest gratitude to the nurses, doctors, and healthcare staff who made this possible for her family and who work every day to support so many families across the city.” (via CBS News)
